revised_title: A Case Study of a Boy with an Unusual Appetite in Black Barnsley, Yorkshire
tldr: A 12-year-old boy from Black Barnsley, Yorkshire, suffers from an extraordinary canine appetite, consuming large quantities of food daily. The boy's condition began a year ago, and if not fed immediately, he would gnaw the flesh off his own bones. This case study documents the boy's food intake over six days, totaling 384 ounces consumed.
